name: United We Tab
overview:
United We Tab is an online publisher of video-enhanced sheet music and guitar tablature, launching in Q2 2010.

United We Tab offers a massive selection of 100% legal tablature, and features several unique user-experience enhancements, including free full-length demonstration videos for thousands of guitar transcriptions.

Each year, guitarists download more than 500 million tablature pieces; 98% of these 600 million tablature downloads are unlicensed AND are low-quality “user generated” transcriptions that are often inaccurate, incomplete and poorly formatted.

United We Tab is focused on materially improving these market deficiencies, and the company’s has developed an online offering that features an expansive selection of guitar tablature, interactive online technologies, and streaming video, which are outlined in summary detail below:

1) Compelling Videos and Technology: UWTâ€™s free, full-length demonstration videos, which accompany thousands of tablature files, along with custom-built interactive tablature viewing software, offer a significantly improved user experience;

2) Highest Quality: UWTâ€™s highly accurate tablature provides consumers a superior (and 100% legal) alternative to pirated and â€œuser-generatedâ€ websites, which mainly offer low quality and incomplete transcriptions;

3) Faster Access to New Hit Songs: United We Tab transcribes new songs in record time, filling a material void for new songs consumers want, but rarely find on other tablature retail websites; and

4) Accessible Price: UWTâ€™s superior selection and user-experience, combined with its low prices (often only $0.99 price per tablature file), offer a compelling proposition to consumers.
